mapper.sql: ${tableAlias}S_TRAINSETID as "${columnPrefix}trainsetId", ${tableAlias}S_DATE as "${columnPrefix}date", ${tableAlias}S_REPAIRCODE as "${columnPrefix}repairCode", ${tableAlias}S_ACCMILE as "${columnPrefix}accmile", ${tableAlias}S_DEPTCODE as "${columnPrefix}deptCode", ${tableAlias}C_SYNFLAG as "${columnPrefix}synFlag", ${tableAlias}D_SYNTIME as "${columnPrefix}synTime", ${tableAlias}D_CREATETIME as "${columnPrefix}createTime"
